show.title: Give me a Hug
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://applinks.kukufm.com/QEunjcNYnSJPuCaN8
show.description:
After fleeing an abusive home as a child, a young girl disappears without a trace. Her elder brother, bound by love and regret, spends twenty years searching for her and finally brings her back.
But the home she returns to has changed. Her mother, younger brother, and foster sister reject her presence, unwilling to accept the past she carries. This is a story of enduring love, painful reunions, and the quiet resilience of a family learning to heal one fractured bond at a time.
show.description_secondary:
After fleeing an abusive home as a child, a young girl disappears without a trace. Her elder brother, bound by love and regret, spends twenty years searching for her and finally brings her back.
But the home she returns to has changed. Her mother, younger brother, and foster sister reject her presence, unwilling to accept the past she carries. This is a story of enduring love, painful reunions, and the quiet resilience of a family learning to heal one fractured bond at a time.
